com.here.android.mpa.isoline

Class IsolineOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.isoline.IsolineOptions

  • public class IsolineOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the definition of the IsolineOptions class. The class contains options for isoline calculation.

      • getViewResolution

        public int getViewResolution()
        Gets the view resolution.
        Returns:
        The view resolution to be used for this IsolineOptions.

      • setViewResolution

        public IsolineOptions setViewResolution(int resolution)
        Sets the view resolution.

        The view resolution allows the client to specify the level of detail needed for visualizing the polygon. It is specified in meters per pixel and reflects the client's zoom level and screen resolution. The isoline service will use this value in order to find the optimal level of detail. specify the level of detail needed for the isoline polygon. Higher resolution may cause increased response time from the service.

        Parameters:
        resolution - The desired view resolution to use.
        Returns:
        The modified IsolineOptions itself.

      • getComputeSingleComponent

        public boolean getComputeSingleComponent()
        Returns true is the isoline service will always return single polygon instead of creating a separate polygon for each ferry separated island.
        Returns:
        true if set, otherwise false.

      • setComputeSingleComponent

        public IsolineOptions setComputeSingleComponent(boolean computeSingleComponent)
        Sets to true the isoline service will always return single polygon instead of creating a separate polygon for each ferry separated island.
        Parameters:
        computeSingleComponent - The desired compute single component flag.
        Returns:
        The modified IsolineOptions itself.
